price: Bagarariji! Umuhero w’isi vuba bwango urashika nta gisivya, kugira muhanirwe ivyo mwakoze, ntimurinde kwihuta mu gutebura musaba ko mwohanwa. Nihaninahazwe Imana Allah Yongere Ihabwe n’icubahiro nta ngere mu buryo burengeye cane ivyo ababangikanyamana bayibangikanya.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
